title: Stylish Solihull Escape in Heart of Town Overlooking Lake
description: Frolic in the gorgeous, picturesque English countryside with a stylish escape to Crowne Plaza Solihull, an IHG Hotel. Feel the vibrancy of this historic town, and search for famed English pub food or Michelin-starred cuisine from your prime position. For day-long adventures, explore the nearby Warwick Castle, Cadbury World and Resorts World Birmingham. A delicious meal on the tranquil outdoor terrace awaits your return, or wander along the hotel gardens and lakeside at your leisure.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Solihull, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 61 Homer Road, Solihull B91 3QD, United Kingdom

title: UK Stylish Solihull Escape near Birmingham with Indoor Pool

Outside of the hotel, explore the National Exhibition Centre, Warwick Castle or mouthwatering Cadbury World.
